mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order_detail (odno, ono, pno, odoption, odproduct_count) values (seq_order_detail_odno.nextval, #{ono}, #{pno}, #{odoption}, #{odproduct_count})
mapper.select: select odno, tbl_order_detail.pno, ono, pname, pimage_thoumb, odprice, odoption, odproduct_count from tbl_order_detail, tbl_product where ono = #{ono} and tbl_product.pno = tbl_order_detail.pno
